about_the_game:
Dive into a world where every grapple is a dance of desire, every pin a promise of pleasure. In this all-female wrestling universe, stunning vixens in barely-there outfits lock horns and lips in a battle for dominance. Experience the heat, the passion, the raw, lesbian power as these warriors turn the ring into a stage for their most intimate conquests. 🌟🔥

💎 Electrifying Puzzle Gameplay

Test your cleverness and libido with three tantalizing puzzle modes: Swapping, Rotating, and the high-flying combo of both. Each maneuver artfully unveils glistening skin, heaving breasts, and enticing curves of these dominant divas. Solve the puzzles and unlock jaw-dropping scenes that will have you tapping out from sheer excitement, while unexpected delights hit you harder than a jumping cutter out of nowhere. 🥊🔥

💪 Dominate the Sexy Fighters

Meet the panty-dropping gladiators of the ring—curvy, intoxicating, and insatiable in their drive to conquer. From twins who double team with pleasure, a fierce fighter who keeps you locked in both headlocks and fantasies, to a grappler with an eye for the dirtiest tricks—these vixens in skimpy outfits are here to entice your deepest desires, taking you on an unregulated, no-holds-barred ride, you’ll be lucky to take that trip to the bat cave where the thrills get raw and untamed. 🥋💦

📸 Unlimited Replay

Capture every arched back, every breathless moan in the wrestlers' ultimate high-definition gallery. Relive every sexy pin where latex snaps, juices flow, and faces get sat on for the best stinky face imaginable. Command the gallery with ease—regardless of your dominant hand ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)! Got a favorite wrestling temptress? Give her that heart punch bookmark for those nighttime brawls where you need a special move to work yourself into a sticky shoot! 🎥🌶️

🌟 In-Depth Character Profiles

Each fierce contender has her tale—her secret move, her risqué fantasies, and what drives her wild between the ropes. Whether she’s a tantalizing rookie ready to learn or a sultry veteran who knows how to make you scream, these profiles delve into their deepest secrets—laying the threads bare without missing a beat. Finishing move, kinks, dirty talk and more—all in the open for your pleasure, like an unexpected twist of desire. 📝💋🔥

🎶 Hard-Hitting Music and Player Controls

Immerse yourself in the pulsating beats of 20+ tracks of hard-hitting trap and hip-hop, each track dropping like a top rope elbow, setting the scene for every sensual encounter in the ring. The draggable music player puts you in control—mix it up like a tag team champion to set your own pace in every sensual sparring match. 🎼🎧🔥

💻 Cutting-edge Technical Features

Lose yourself in the fantasy with full Ultrawide and super ultrawide support, capturing every sultry detail during the heat of battle like a perfectly executed aerial leap. Catch every illicit moment as the stakes climb higher and the pleasures grow deeper. 🎬💻

♿ Accessibility Features

Adjust background animations, text colors, and select dyslexia-friendly fonts to ensure nothing stands between you and the action. Need a fast escape? Quick Quit and customizable window name features keep your secrets safe, no botch. 🕶️🔒

🌟 From the opening bell to the final pin, witness a world where women reign supreme in a spectacle of passion and power. Ascend to the pinnacle of pleasure as the Pussy Master Champion in this all-female arena. Only the wildest deserve a shot at Pussy Master: ALL PUSSY WRESTLING—will you work yourself into a shoot? Or will you rub out banger, after banger, until you cant bang no more!? 🤼‍♀️🎉

All characters depicted are adults (21+).

content_descriptors.notes: Pussy Master: ALL PUSSY WRESTLING features explicit sexual content, including nudity, various sexual acts, genitalia, masturbation, bodily fluids and BDSM themes. All characters portrayed are engaging in consensual activities and are adults (21+).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K (4 cores, 3.3 GHz)/AMD FX-6300 (6 cores, 3.5 GHz)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (4 GB)/AMD Radeon R9 290 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note that the processor and graphics requirements are estimates; actual performance may vary based on specific hardware and software configurations.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
